data.title: These Companies Are Adding Billions In Stock Buybacks
data.text: Lowe's and Mastercard joined Raytheon Technologies in announcing big stock buybacks this week as investors eye a rebound in shareholder returns. The post These Companies Are Adding Billions In Stock Buybacks appeared first on Investor's Business Daily.

data.title: Mastercard (MA) Hikes Dividend, Authorizes New Buyback Program
data.text: Mastercard's (MA) latest dividend hike and authorization of new buyback program reflects strong financial position and constant efforts to enhance shareholders' value.

data.title: 2 Black Friday Winners Hiding in Plain Sight
data.text: It's not where consumers shopped, it's how they paid.
